name: Reply to Income Tax Notice (143(1)/142(1))
description: Reply to income tax notice or intimation
body:
To,
The Assessing Officer
Income Tax Department
Subject: Reply to Notice under Section {{notice_type}} of the Income Tax Act, 1961

This has reference to your notice dated {{notice_date}} bearing Reference/DIN {{notice_reference}} issued under Section {{notice_type}} of the Income Tax Act, 1961 for Assessment Year {{assessment_year}}.
2. {{assessee_name}}, PAN {{pan}}, having address at {{assessee_address}}, hereby submits the following reply:

3. ACKNOWLEDGMENT:

The assessee acknowledges receipt of the notice and submits this reply within the time prescribed.

6. COMPLIANCE:

6.1 The assessee has filed the return of income for AY {{assessment_year}} on time and in accordance with law.

6.2 All income has been correctly disclosed and all deductions/exemptions claimed are as per law.

6.3 There is no concealment or furnishing of inaccurate particulars.

6.4 The assessee has acted in good faith and in accordance with the provisions of the Income Tax Act.
9. The assessee reserves the right to file further submissions or documents as may be necessary.

Enclosures:
1. Supporting documents as listed
2. Computation of income
3. Bank statements (if applicable)
4. Any other relevant documents
